医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员发现印迹细胞的记忆存储机制让我们的大脑吸收有关世界的新信息并形成记忆的机制是什么？都柏林三一学院的 Tomás Ryan 博士领导的神经科学家团队的新研究表明，学习是通过大脑不同区域的特定印迹细胞之间不断形成新的连接模式而发生的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Researchers-discover-mechanism-for-memory-storage-in-engram-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Researchers-discover-mechanism-for-memory-storage-in-engram-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b157a239-3424-4857-a362-121cf2a1a196 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 08:34:49 -0500 Researchers discover mechanism for memory storage in engram cells
研究表明膳食氨基酸摄入量高与 2 型糖尿病风险增加有关膳食氨基酸摄入量与 2 型糖尿病发病率之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Study-links-high-dietary-amino-acid-intake-to-increased-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Study-links-high-dietary-amino-acid-intake-to-increased-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8e016e2-3eb9-49a1-b286-529ce38a4da0 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 08:25:00 -0500 Study links high dietary amino acid intake to increased type 2 diabetes risk
吃更多的超加工食品可能会增加患上呼吸消化道癌症的风险布里斯托大学和国际机构的研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，吃更多的超加工食品（UPF）可能会增加患上呼吸消化道（包括口腔、喉咙和食道）癌症的风险癌症研究 (IARC)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Eating-more-ultra-processed-foods-may-increase-risk-of-upper-aerodigestive-tract-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Eating-more-ultra-processed-foods-may-increase-risk-of-upper-aerodigestive-tract-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44dceb11-2ad2-4421-8f10-013d49b8381b Wed, 22 Nov 2023 08:22:42 -0500 Eating more ultra-processed foods may increase risk of upper aerodigestive tract cancers
老年人的粮食不安全是否与随后较高的痴呆风险和记忆力下降有关？目前发表在《美国医学会杂志》网络公开版上的研究试图利用纵向数据并补偿生命过程中可能变化的其他变量来确定粮食不安全和痴呆症之间是否存在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Is-food-insecurity-among-older-adults- Associated-with-higher-subsequent-dementia-risk-and-memory-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Is-food-insecurity-among-older-adults- Associated-with-higher-subsequent-dementia-risk-and-memory-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fbf892d-809c-4243-aba5-16438361d4f1 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 08:21:00 -0500 Is food insecurity among older adults associated with higher subsequent dementia risk and memory decline?
检查机动车事故中的行人伤害：流行病学和结果分析行人-机动车事故中头部受伤的流行病学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Examining-pedestrian-injuries-in-motor-vehicle-accidents-epidemiology-and-outcome-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Examining-pedestrian-injuries-in-motor-vehicle-accidents-epidemiology-and-outcome-analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8eaf5fd7-c4f0-456f-9836-63a412b33062 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 08:00:00 -0500 Examining pedestrian injuries in motor vehicle accidents: epidemiology and outcome analysis
研究发现豆类可显着改善美国饮食的营养状况最近在开放获取的同行评审科学期刊《营养》上发表的一项研究表明，用豆类替代少量典型蛋白质来源和精制谷物可以显着改善美国饮食的营养状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Pulses-found-to-significantly-improve-the-nutritional-profile-of-American-diet.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Pulses-found-to-significantly-improve-the-nutritional-profile-of-American-diet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3d89f9e-fc8f-4b19-933f-cd83c4efe417 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 07:57:30 -0500 Pulses found to significantly improve the nutritional profile of American diet
研究人员发现了逆转由 COVID-19 引起的大脑衰老的方法昆士兰大学的研究人员找到了一种方法来逆转由 COVID-19 引发的导致大脑过早衰老的细胞过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Researchers-discover-way-to-reverse-brain-aging-caused-by-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Researchers-discover-way-to-reverse-brain-aging-caused-by-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d23a6fca-259a-414b-902d-ed21f4a3a4ca Wed, 22 Nov 2023 07:29:35 -0500 Researchers discover way to reverse brain aging caused by COVID-19
治疗性病毒和纳米材料的联合应用彻底改变癌症治疗使用溶瘤病毒（OV）与纳米材料相结合作为癌症治疗的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Combined-application-of-therapeutic-viruses-and-nanomaterials-to-revolutionize-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Combined-application-of-therapeutic-viruses-and-nanomaterials-to-revolutionize-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46457f98-79ac-4f0b-a7d9-1059507e2a6b Wed, 22 Nov 2023 06:54:00 -0500 Combined application of therapeutic viruses and nanomaterials to revolutionize cancer therapy
长期护理保险指南如果您很富有，您将能够负担家庭帮助或辅助生活设施或疗养院的护理费用。如果您很穷，您可以向疗养院或家庭护理人员寻求医疗补助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/A-guide-to-long-term-care-insurance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/A-guide-to-long-term-care-insurance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c556a32-a596-44d8-bdfa-da0371d3a246 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 06:47:55 -0500 A guide to long-term care insurance
从医院到酒店：旋转医生将生病视为一次冒险。它不是。上一次我踏上飞机去度假、玩乐已经是三年多前的事了。我没能去加利福尼亚州，我很喜欢那里的海岸。也不是罗马，我和我丈夫在那里住过一段时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/From-hospital-to-hospitality-Spin-doctors-brand-getting-sick-as-an-adventure-Ite28099s-not.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/From-hospital-to-hospitality-Spin-doctors-brand-getting-sick-as-an-adventure-Ite28099s-not.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0e73918-630d-4f1a-a9ed-6095d9041744 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 06:02:58 -0500 From hospital to hospitality: Spin doctors brand getting sick as an adventure. It’s not.
